班拿貝朝聖指南


機票
因航會有直航機，飛大概15個鐘，我好似未見過fanfares有做過馬德里既優惠 (復活節買因航機票六千幾直飛馬德里)
中東三寶，計埋轉機至少都要19個鐘，我上次搭emirates來回大概$4xxx，飛大概20個鐘

波飛
經官網買飛最平，比賽前一個定二個星期開始賣飛，不過有分優先次序，club member > madridista > public
班拿貝球場出面亦都有個官方櫃台可以俾你買飛，都係比賽前一個定二個星期開始賣飛，每日都會有飛分批出售
另外官方櫃台出面都有堆人坐係度會係咁問你係咪買飛
如果係官網買唔到，可以去viagogo, stubhub度買，佢地多數可以一早買定黎緊嗰季既飛，不過通常都係炒價 （我上次係用viagogo買，睇主場對西維爾，坐係同球員通道隔一個block最前排大概$3xxx，y絲睇馬德里打吡，坐兩邊上方，近3000元。）
*注意：賽事有可能會改期，提前好多買飛既巴打自己留意

Tour Bernabéu
可以參觀班拿貝球場、皇家馬德里博物館、球員休息室、領隊座位與球員後備席
門票: €25 (手持Madridista: €17)
開放時間：10:00-19:30 (星期一及星期六)、10:30-18:30 (星期日及假期)
*注意：比賽日開放時間會提早結束，有d地方唔會開放，巴打自己留意

Madridista
即場做madridista有優惠，平過上網申請
另外球場入面間Adidas madridista有95折，ultra boost嗰啲鞋都照樣有折

交通
去班拿貝球場好方便，metro直頭有個班拿貝站，班拿貝站係深藍色10號線，車站兩個出口都係一抬頭就見到球場
開波前一個鐘左右就入得場

以上資訊由duckyea!、潺仔、Y_nada_mas、🔥卻老提供

NYON, Switzerland — UEFA says it is taking no action against Real Madrid captain Sergio Ramos for a clash with Liverpool goalkeeper Loris Karius in the Champions League final.

A disciplinary rule which allows cases to be opened for serious misconduct not seen by the match officials “is not applied in this case,” UEFA says.

Ramos struck Karius’s head with his right elbow in an off-the-ball incident when the score was 0-0 early in the second half of Madrid’s 3-1 win on Saturday.

Television replays also appeared to show Ramos being pushed toward Karius by Liverpool defender Virgil van Dijk.

UEFA says: “No other protest has been lodged.”

Ramos angered fans of Liverpool and Egypt for his earlier challenge that ended Mohamed Salah’s game due to an injured left shoulder.

三篇利/巴迷無視的外媒報導


1.
"It was an accidental challenge"

https://www.independent.co.uk/sport/football/world-cup/mohamed-salah-injury-sergio-ramos-liverpool-world-cup-latest-news-egypt-football-real-madrid-a8375226.html

Mohamed Salah does not blame Real Madrid captain Sergio Ramos for throwing his World Cup dream into doubt, Liverpool’s physic has claimed.

Salah was forced off in the first-half of Saturday’s Champions League final between the two clubs, with Liverpool going on to lose 3-1.

The shoulder injury Salah sustained could yet rule him out of Russia 2018, but Liverpool physio Ruben Pons insists the Egyptian bears no animosity towards Ramos, who has been roundly criticised by fans and pundits for the robust challenge.

“Salah has not told me anything about Sergio Ramos,” said the Spaniard.

“I don’t think he is angry with him. It was an accidental challenge.

“We knew that it was something serious as soon as he fell on the ground because he never complains. We feared the worst.

“I was devastated. I tried to keep him calm. I told him he couldn’t do anything about it now and that he should not worry. It was time to look for solutions and not regret that things had not worked out.”

Pons also insisted that Liverpool’s medical team were doing everything in their power to have Salah back in time for the big kick-off.

Egypt’s World Cup campaign begins against Uruguay on June 15, before games against Saudi Arabia and the host nation, Russia.

“Once we knew the injury, we planned the treatment,” said Pons. “He is sad about what happened, but is totally focused on his recovery and seeing when he can be ready.

“He is going to mark the recovery times. In principle it will be three to four weeks, but we are going to try to reduce those deadlines, that’s the big goal.”

2.
"New angle of footage suggests Mohamed Salah was the one who locked arms with Sergio Ramos before suffering shoulder injury in Champions League final"

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-5786667/New-footage-suggests-Mo-Salah-one-locked-arms-Sergio-Ramos.html



A new angle of footage seems to suggest that it was in fact Mohamed Salah who had a hold of Sergio Ramos before he fell to the ground and suffered a shoulder injury that forced him off during Saturday's Champions League final.

Salah suffered what Jurgen Klopp described as 'a really serious injury,' after falling awkwardly as he contested for the ball with Ramos in the first half, though Liverpool's physio has since claimed the Egyptian is looking at a matter of weeks on the sidelines and not months.

The Madrid captain has nonetheless since found himself in the middle of a storm after critics whipped up a frenzy by accusing him of purposely injuring Salah in an attempt to suppress Liverpool's attacking line.

3.
"Television replays also appeared to show Ramos being pushed toward Karius by Liverpool defender Virgil van Dijk."

http://www.espn.com/soccer/real-madrid/story/3512665/real-madrids-sergio-ramos-to-face-no-action-for-loris-karius-clash-uefa

UEFA says it is taking no action against Real Madrid captain Sergio Ramos for a clash with Liverpool goalkeeper Loris Karius in Saturday's Champions League final.

A disciplinary rule which allows cases to be opened for serious misconduct not seen by the match officials "is not applied in this case," UEFA says.

Ramos struck Karius's head with his right elbow in an off-the-ball incident when the score was 0-0 early in the second half of Madrid's 3-1 win on Saturday.

Television replays also appeared to show Ramos being pushed toward Karius by Liverpool defender Virgil van Dijk.

"No other protest has been lodged," UEFA said.

Ramos angered fans of Liverpool and Egypt for his earlier challenge that ended Mohamed Salah's game due to an injured left shoulder.

An online petition demanding UEFA and FIFA take retrospective action against Ramos is nearing 500,000 signatures.

replies.msg: thank you for 10 years effort, 牙朗

C朗被索以2800萬歐元代牢

【now.com體育】根據西班牙《阿斯報》指，西班牙稅局已拒絕基斯坦奴朗拿度以1400萬歐元，抵消逃稅控罪的要求，要求更高的金額。

皇家馬德里射手基斯坦奴朗拿度（Cristiano Ronaldo）在上年6月被西班牙稅局檢控，指其在肖像權收入方面逃避1480萬歐元稅項；他早前表示願意認罪，並向當局支付1400萬歐元，以完結案件。

不過，稅局已拒絕了C朗的請求，要求他要支付1480萬歐元的逃稅，加上利息、罰款、案件的支出，即近2800萬歐元，而C朗可以選擇在6月15日前付錢了事，或在世界盃決賽周後繼續打官司。

要是這名33歲葡萄牙國腳選擇繼續打官司，而最終被定罪，將面臨至少8年的牢獄之災。

C朗在歐聯決賽後正在休假，之後會向葡萄牙國家隊報到，備戰在俄羅斯舉行的世界盃決賽周。

傳大哨3000萬歐元購華拉度列

【now.com體育】巴西傳媒指，一代巴西球星朗拿度擬出價3000萬歐元，入主西乙球會華拉度列。

據巴西報章《環球報》指，曾效力多間歐洲班霸的巴西球星朗拿度，正與華拉度列的會長卡路士蘇亞雷斯進行磋商，並指「大哨」擬以3000萬歐元的價錢收購球會，雖然蘇亞雷斯受訪時否認已收到斟介，但表明若有人願出此價錢，就會接受。

曾效力巴塞隆拿、國際米蘭、皇家馬德里及AC米蘭等頂級球會，並帶領巴西贏過2002年世界盃的朗拿度，何故與華拉度列扯上關係？原來他與華度拉利的副會長荷西摩路曾是紅酒生意的合作伙伴。

41歲的朗拿度雖然已掛靴，但一直與足球分不開，年前已開始在世界各地開設以他為名的足球學校。

沙維表示皇馬奪歐聯有幸運成份：「他們的對手總有主力受傷，PSG有尼馬、拜仁有洛賓及保定。」

「利物浦最重要的球員又傷，加上紅軍卡利奧斯犯錯。拜仁最重要的門將紐亞又傷，烏里治在四強又同樣犯錯。」

「就像中咒一樣，巴塞不是贏不到，只是只限聯賽，皇馬就贏歐聯。」
牙朗賽後都講過幾日後就會有答案. 今日就係幾日後/_\
